subject: New review (4★) of Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback (from John B.)
description_text:
Rating: 4 | Review Text: For the price these haptic reactors can't really be beaten. Solid construction, a little tricky to mount on some of the pedals but they did go on with some cajoling and unscrewing of various pedal bolts. 

The force feedback feels good I mainly have ABS, traction loss and then road rumble strips running at either end. Couldn't seem to get it to work via the Simsonn software on iRacing so am using SimHub.

One gripe however is the power cable doesn't seem to lock into place and so comes lose easily when moving the rig. conversations.body_text: Hi john,     You can try updating to SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.0 to see if it resolves the ABS telemetry issue in iRacing. For now, you can temporarily secure the motor’s power cable with a zip tie. I’ll also pass this feedback on to the team to see if we can improve the power cable locking mechanism in future designs.
